TopicTitle: Uncontrollable spin during the time warp

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.1.3.2 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Windows 10 | CPU: Intel(R) Core(TM) i3-8350K CPU @ 4.00GHz 4.01 GHz | GPU: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti | RAM: 16 GB

 

During the acceleration of time, the spacecraft begins to rotate uncontrollably and after disabling the acceleration of time, it is impossible to turn off the engines. I discovered this some time ago but decided to post it because I had this bug repeated. 

Also, what happened to me with this bug is that the delta v is not calculated (as shown here, for some reason it counts 3000 and that the engines are turned off, although the delta v is not like that and the engines are working) and it is impossible to build maneuvers. Before turning on the engine and speeding up time, I tried to build a maneuver, but since the game considered that I had no fuel, I could not build a maneuver.
